title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A quick Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and pepper.
instructions: Boil pasta, fry bacon, and mix with beaten eggs and cheese until creamy.

title: Chicken Biryani
description: A flavorful rice dish with marinated chicken and Indian spices.
instructions: Marinate chicken, cook with rice, spices, and simmer until ready.

title: Vegan Bowl
description: Healthy mix of grains, greens, and roasted veggies.
instructions: Roast veggies, mix with grains, and top with dressing.

title: Sushi Platter
description: Fresh assortment of sushi rolls with wasabi and soy sauce.
instructions: Roll sushi rice with veggies or fish, slice, and serve.

title: Cheeseburger
description: Juicy grilled beef patty with cheese, lettuce, and tomato.
instructions: Grill the beef patty, melt cheese on top, and assemble the burger.

title: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce with creamy Caesar dressing and croutons.
instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing, add croutons, and serve.

title: Pad Thai
description: Classic Thai noodle dish with shrimp, peanuts, and lime.
instructions: Cook noodles, stir-fry with shrimp, peanuts, and lime.

title: Margherita Pizza
description: Simple pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and fresh basil.
instructions: Top dough with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil, then bake.

title: Falafel Wrap
description: Chickpea patties wrapped with hummus and veggies in pita bread.
instructions: Fry falafel and wrap with hummus and veggies.

title: Ramen Noodles
description: Rich and flavorful Japanese noodle soup with toppings.
instructions: Cook noodles, add broth and toppings, and simmer.

title: Grilled Salmon
description: Perfectly grilled salmon fillet with herbs and lemon.
instructions: Grill salmon, season with herbs, and serve with lemon.

title: Tacos al Pastor
description: Mexican-style tacos with marinated pork and pineapple.
instructions: Grill marinated pork, add pineapple, and serve in tacos.

title: Butter Chicken
description: Creamy Indian chicken curry served with naan or rice.
instructions: Cook chicken in creamy sauce and serve with naan or rice.

title: Avocado Toast
description: Toasted bread topped with smashed avocado and seasoning.
instructions: Toast bread, mash avocado, and season with lemon.

title: French Crepes
description: Thin pancakes filled with sweet or savory toppings.
instructions: Cook thin pancakes and fill with sweet or savory ingredients.

title: Pho
description: Vietnamese noodle soup with beef, herbs, and rice noodles.
instructions: Prepare broth, cook noodles, and add beef and herbs.

title: Beef Stroganoff
description: Tender beef in a creamy mushroom sauce over noodles.
instructions: Cook beef in a creamy sauce and serve over noodles.

title: Greek Salad
description: Fresh tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta cheese.
instructions: Mix tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta for a fresh salad.

title: Churros with Chocolate
description: Fried dough pastries served with hot chocolate sauce.
instructions: Fry dough and serve with chocolate sauce.

title: Egg Fried Rice
description: Chinese-style rice stir-fried with eggs and vegetables.
instructions: Stir-fry rice with eggs and vegetables.
